titleStmt.title: A looking glasse for maried folkes Wherein they may plainly see their deformities; and also how to behaue themselues one to another, and both of them towards God. Set forth dialogue-wise for the more tastable and plainnesse sake. By R. S.
titleStmt.author: Snawsel, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for Henry Bell and are to be sold at his shop on Holburne Hill neere the crosse Keyes,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through, and some pages stained; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop on Holburne Hill neere the crosse Keyes
